cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's taberu

cards.english: plate, counter for plates or helpings

sentence.english: I obtained some unusual sake.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kantoku

sentence.kanji: その監督はアカデミー賞を受賞したよな。
sentence.romaji: sono kantoku ha akademi-shou wo jushou shita yo na
sentence.english: The director won an Academy Award.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ishokujuu

sentence.kanji: 土地によって衣食住は変化する。
sentence.romaji: tochi niyote ishokujuu ha henka suru
sentence.english: Clothing, food and housing vary from region to region.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tanshuku

sentence.kanji: 今日は授業を1時間に短縮します。
sentence.romaji: kyou ha jugyou wo 1 jikan ni tanshuku shimasu
sentence.english: The class will be reduced to one hour today.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kekan

sentence.kanji: 年をとると血管が硬くなります。
sentence.romaji: toshi wo toru to kekan ga kataku narimasu
sentence.english: The blood vessels harden with age.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kairyou

sentence.kanji: 日本では絶えず米の品種を改良しているの。
sentence.romaji: nihon de ha taezu kome no hinshu wo kairyou shite iru no
sentence.english: Varieties of rice are always being improved in Japan.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nenpai

sentence.kanji: 年配の人に席を譲りました。
sentence.romaji: nenpai no hito ni seki wo yuzurimashita
sentence.english: I gave up my seat to an elderly person.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sakan

sentence.kanji: その都市は商業が盛んよ。
sentence.romaji: sono toshi ha shougyou ga sakan yo
sentence.english: Commerce is thriving in that city.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's moriageru

sentence.kanji: 応援団が試合を盛り上げたんだ。
sentence.romaji: ouendan ga shiai wo moriageta n da
sentence.english: The cheering squad boosted the excitement of the game.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's moriagaru

sentence.kanji: 昨夜のパーティはとても盛り上がったな。
sentence.romaji: sakuya no pa-tei ha totemo moriagata na
sentence.english: Last night's party was very lively.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's moru

sentence.kanji: ご飯を盛ってください。
sentence.romaji: gohan wo mote kudasai
sentence.english: Please fill the bowl with rice.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kanshou

sentence.kanji: 今夜はオペラ鑑賞に行きます。
sentence.romaji: konya ha opera kanshou ni ikimasu
sentence.english: I'm going to see an opera tonight.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's inkan

sentence.kanji: ここに受け取りの印鑑をお願いします。
sentence.romaji: koko ni uketori no inkan wo onegai shimasu
sentence.english: Please put your personal seal here for the receipt.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's onsen

sentence.kanji: ここの温泉はよく効くそうです。
sentence.romaji: koko no onsen ha yoku kiku sou desu
sentence.english: I hear this hot spring is very effective.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yorokobi

sentence.kanji: 人々は喜びに沸いた。
sentence.romaji: hitobito ha yorokobi ni waita
sentence.english: The people were buzzing with happiness.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hane

sentence.kanji: このペンは鳥の羽根で作られています。
sentence.romaji: kono pen ha tori no hane de tsukurarete imasu
sentence.english: This pen is made from a bird's feather.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nakayoku

sentence.kanji: あの夫婦は仲良く暮らしているよ。
sentence.romaji: ano fuufu ha nakayoku kurashite iru yo
sentence.english: That married couple is living happily together.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shokuryou

sentence.kanji: 食料はこの箱に入っています。
sentence.romaji: shokuryou ha kono hako ni haite imasu
sentence.english: Food supplies are in this box.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's akiru

sentence.kanji: その子はおもちゃに飽きたようだね。
sentence.romaji: sono ko ha omocha ni akita you da ne
sentence.english: The child seems to have gotten tired of the toy.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kazari

sentence.kanji: この部屋は飾りが多すぎるな。
sentence.romaji: kono heya ha kazari ga oosugiru na
sentence.english: There are too many decorations in this room.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's esa

sentence.kanji: 毎日金魚に餌をやります。
sentence.romaji: mainichi kingyo ni esa wo yarimasu
sentence.english: I feed the goldfish everyday.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ganka

sentence.kanji: 眼科で視力検査をしました。
sentence.romaji: ganka de shiryoku kensa wo shimashita
sentence.english: I took an eyesight test in the eye clinic.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kingan

sentence.kanji: 彼女は近眼です。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha kingan desu
sentence.english: She is nearsighted.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's urami

sentence.kanji: 彼女は長年の恨みを晴らした。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha naganen no urami wo harashita
sentence.english: She settled an old score.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's uramu

sentence.kanji: 彼を恨んではいけません。
sentence.romaji: kare wo urande ha ikemasen
sentence.english: You should not bear a grudge against him.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's genkai

sentence.kanji: もう我慢の限界です。
sentence.romaji: mou gaman no genkai desu
sentence.english: I can't take any more.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shokutaku

sentence.kanji: 食卓に花を飾りましょう。
sentence.romaji: shokutaku ni hana wo kazarimashou
sentence.english: Let's decorate the dining table with flowers.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mame

sentence.kanji: 今、豆を煮ています。
sentence.romaji: ima mame wo nite imasu
sentence.english: I'm boiling some beans now.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's eiyou

sentence.kanji: 豆腐は栄養のある食べ物です。
sentence.romaji: toufu ha eiyou no aru tabemono desu
sentence.english: Bean curd is a nutritious food.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's bonchi

sentence.kanji: 盆地は夏、とても暑いんだ。
sentence.romaji: bonchi ha natsu、totemo atsui n da
sentence.english: It's very hot in the valley in summer.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's bon

sentence.kanji: お盆は実家に帰りました。
sentence.romaji: o bon ha jika ni kaerimashita
sentence.english: I returned to my parents' home at the Bon festival.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's bon

sentence.kanji: 母が料理をお盆に乗せたの。
sentence.romaji: haha ga ryouri wo obon ni noseta no
sentence.english: My mother put the dishes on a tray.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's bonodori

sentence.kanji: みんなで盆踊りに行きました。
sentence.romaji: minna de bonodori ni ikimashita
sentence.english: We all went to the Bon festival dance.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's su

sentence.kanji: お酢を入れすぎて酸っぱい。
sentence.romaji: o su wo iresugite supai
sentence.english: It's sour because I put in too much vinegar.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's taigai

sentence.kanji: 大概、風邪は寝ていれば治ります。
sentence.romaji: taigai kaze ha nete ireba naorimasu
sentence.english: Generally, colds get better after you get some sleep.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hogaraka

sentence.kanji: 彼はとても朗らかな人です。
sentence.romaji: kare ha totemo hogaraka na hito desu
sentence.english: He's a very cheerful person.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kojiki

sentence.kanji: 乞食が公園のベンチで寝ている。
sentence.romaji: kojiki ga kouen no benchi de nete iru
sentence.english: A beggar is sleeping on the park bench.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yunomi

sentence.kanji: 湯飲みにはお茶を入れてお茶碗にはご飯をよそいます。
sentence.romaji: yunomi ni ha ocha wo irete o chawan ni ha gohan wo yosoimasu
sentence.english: We pour tea in a teacup and serve rice in a rice bowl.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mochi

sentence.kanji: 正月には餅を食べますよ。
sentence.romaji: shougatsu ni ha mochi wo tabemasu yo
sentence.english: We eat rice cakes during the New Year.
